review: Just what I wanted and expected.  Arrived on time.  It's a great product and I highly recommend it
author: Danielle

review: It was very easy to setup and has been working great! I love it. So much cheaper than Apple TV.
author: csb

review: Advertised as "Works with Android phones and tablets, iPhone, iPad, Mac, Windows, and Chromebooks" but the message "Requires Windows 7 or above" pops up on install.  DOES NOT WORK WITH WINDOWS VISTA HOME PREMIUM.  VERIFIED WITH GOOGLE PRODUCT SUPPORT.GOOGLE needs to correct this misleading claim on numerous web sites..
author: C. W.

review: Works well and streams video great.
author: L in Scottsdale

review: This your phone and Netfix and you have HDTV without cable on the go on any screen. Presentations no big deal from my cell phone. These are great and I expect will only get better.
author: Alan "jbasinger"

review: Returned it for the Roku stick.. It's just really nice to have remote and an interface to select/store apps on.
author: bannon gallaher

review: THE BEST MEDIA PLAYER ON THE MARKET.
author: Leonardo C Torrealba
